name: spr_writer
description: Creates an SPR by combining provided data with content from a predefined markdown file, effectively compressing the input data into a more succinct representation.

data.description: Input data to be transformed into an SPR.

return.description: A compressed Sparse Priming Representation of the provided data.

name: spr_reader
description: Expands an SPR back into a more detailed form by combining it with predefined markdown content, effectively decompressing the SPR data.

data.description: SPR data to be expanded into detailed content.

return.description: Decompressed content derived from the provided SPR.

name: get_user_profile
description: Retrieve a user's profile using username or email

name: gitops_browse_web
description: Browse the web and retrieve information from a specified URL

name: gitops_invoke_github_actions_pipeline
description: Invoke a pipeline in GitHub Actions

repository.description: The GitHub repository containing the pipeline

workflow_id.description: The ID of the workflow to invoke

return.description: The status of the invoked pipeline

name: procure_requestor_submit_item_request
description: Submits a request for specific items needed for operational purposes.

item_id.description: The unique identifier for the item.

specifications.description: Any specific requirements for the item.

items.description: A list of items requested, including specifications and quantity.

reason.description: The reason for the item request, explaining the need for the operation.

return.description: Acknowledgment of the request submission, with a reference number for tracking.

name: procure_requestor_update_request_details
description: Updates the details of an already submitted procurement request.

request_id.description: The unique identifier of the request to update.

updated_details.description: The new details of the request, including any changes to items or quantities.

return.description: Confirmation of the request update, with the updated details reflected.

name: procure_requestor_cancel_request
description: Cancels a previously submitted procurement request.

request_id.description: The unique identifier of the request to cancel.

return.description: Confirmation of the request cancellation, with details of any implications.

name: procure_purchaser_initiate_negotiation
description: Starts the negotiation process with a supplier for a procurement task.

supplier_id.description: The unique identifier of the supplier to negotiate with.

procurement_details.description: Details of the procurement items, quantities, and initial price points.

return.description: The status of the negotiation initiation, including any immediate counter-offers.

name: procure_purchaser_finalize_purchase
description: Finalizes the purchasing agreement and processes payment.

purchase_order_id.description: The unique identifier of the purchase order to finalize.

payment_details.description: The payment information including method, amounts, and terms.

return.description: Confirmation of the completed purchase and payment transaction details.

name: procure_purchaser_track_order
description: Tracks the status of an order from placement to delivery.

order_id.description: The unique identifier of the order to track.

return.description: Current status and location of the order, including expected delivery dates.

name: procure_approver_review_purchase_request
description: Reviews a purchase request for compliance with budget and procurement policies.

request_id.description: The unique identifier of the purchase request to review.

return.description: The decision on the purchase request, including any required modifications.

name: procure_approver_authorize_payment
description: Authorizes the payment for a purchase order.

purchase_order_id.description: The unique identifier of the purchase order for which payment is to be authorized.

return.description: Confirmation of payment authorization, with details of the payment terms.

name: procure_approver_audit_procurement
description: Conducts an audit of procurement activities to ensure policy adherence and financial integrity.

time_frame.description: The specific time frame for the audit, with start and end dates.

return.description: The findings of the procurement audit, including any discrepancies and recommendations.
